nodes.text: A plasma bridge was a style of bridge made from plasma, a type of energy which would solidify when projected between two plasma projectors. Lessu, the capital city of Ryloth, was situated on a large rock spire and primarily accessible through one such bridge. When the bridge fell under the control of the Separatists during their occupation during the Clone Wars, Jedi General Mace Windu and Advanced Recon Force Scout Troopers Razor and Stak launched an operation to retake the bridge when Galactic Republic and Twi'lek Resistance forces prepared to attack Lessu.
